ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I'm Keryan CAZABAN, a full-stack developer specialized in React and Node.js. With expertise in modern web technologies, I help businesses build performant, maintainable, and user-focused web applications.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: I work on both the front end (React, TypeScript, UI) and the back end (Node.js, API, databases), with a strong focus on code quality and user experience.

CONTACT.INTRO: Interested in working together? Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear from you!

HOME.JOB: Full-Stack Developer React / Node.js | TypeScript | Freelance & Permanent
HOME.JOB_DESCRIPTION: Crafting modern, scalable web applications with cutting-edge technologies. Let's bring your ideas to life.
